name: OneLife
0:
”Alexa set OneLife to boost mode”
”Alexa set OneLife to 50 percent”
”Alexa turn off OneLife”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The OneLife Skill enables the OneLife X air purifier to be operated using voice control.
You can turn on your air purifier with just your voice and switch between different operating modes.

To use the OneLife Skill you need a OneLife X air purifier and the OneLife app.
The skill is linked to your user account from the OneLife app and enables you to access your OneLife X air purifier.
